Zap(bytes32,address,address,uint256).details: Event emitted when a zap occurs

params.messageId: Unique message identifier for each zap

params.amount: The amount of ETH to be zapped
params.receiver: The address of the EOA on the destination chain

returns.feeAmount: The CCIP tx fee in ETH.

params.receiver: The address of the EOA on the destination chain

returns.messageId: The ID of the message that was sent

getFee(uint256,address).notice: Used to estimate fee for CCIP transaction

zap(address).notice: Accepts ETH, zaps for OETH, wraps it for WOETH and sends it to the destination chain (arbitrum)

userdoc.notice: Helps to directly convert ETH on mainnet into WOETH on L2s.
